name: Boorio
description: Social media has evolved in the past 5 years. We have taken the next step by rewarding our users. In the current climate its vital to have multiple ways of earning income and social media is the perfect way to earn while staying safe. We have 1 trilion boorio coins to give away to our creators. Post something amazing and you will earn for every like you get. Our next application will be Crypto Poker, giving our creators and investors even more ways to earn and spend.
